summary: REQ-14 and REQ-15 appear implemented: /admin now shows a dedicated unauthenticated “Admin Login Required” screen with Internet Identity guidance and a clear next action (LoginButton), avoids indefinite loading when not authenticated, and includes explicit copy that admin access is Principal-based and not username/email/phone/password-based. No evidence in the diff of collecting/storing admin credentials or displaying the provided credential-like strings.
